descriptions:
['DescriptionThe Noble House Real Estate presents you this  well maintained, spacious 2 bedroom en suite apartment for Sale in South Ridge. The exceptionally designed, South Ridge homes are among the first choice of residences in Downtown, Dubai. The apartment is located on a high floor occupying a Built Up Area of 1,484 sq.ft offering a view of the Burj Khalifa and fountain.
The property is well maintained, spacious, bright and airy. Once you enter the apartment you will be greeted by the large living room with a direct access to the balcony. It has a semi open kitchen and the kitchen cabinets have a dark wood finish with built in appliances like fridge, cooker and washer. The master bedroom has en suite bathroom and with decent size built in wardrobes. The apartment offers Downtown View and Burj Khalifa from its window.
From your home in South Ridge, you are also within strolling distance of the vivacious Burj Dubai Boulevard, with its tasteful boutiques, cafés, restaurants, captivating street life of The Old Town and the shopping paradise of The Dubai Mall. This is your opportunity to put a new lifestyle inclination.
For more details of the property and for viewing arrangement, pls call The Noble House Real Estate at +97144566135 or visit our website at www.tnh.ae.']

The Emirates Garden development in Jumeirah Village Circle offers a choice of studio, one and two-bedroom apartments in themes of the Mediterranean and Arabic architecture. descriptions: ["DescriptionAbode Property are delighted to offer this\xa0great apartment for sea lovers with stunning sea view!2 Bedroom ApartmentMaid's room2000 sqftStunning Sea View2 balconiesBeach Club downstairs\xa0\nAn F type layout, the largest of the 2 bedrooms on the Shoreline apartments, the well kept apartment briefly comprises of; entrance hall with semi-closed fully equipped kitchen, spacious lounge and dining area with balcony overlooking the private beach.\xa0 The master bedroom has its own balcony, built in wardrobes and large en-suite bathroom with double sinks.\xa0 The second bedroom has built in wardrobes and access to a family bathroomOther benefits include a maids room, parking for one car and access to the exclusive Riva Beachclub\xa0The Shoreline community with direct access to residents-only beaches boosts its resort-like lifestyle and it is a perfect getaway from daily routine. With beach clubs and plenty of restaurants and shops and with the upcoming mall very close by it is one of the most sought-after locations."]

['DescriptionVillas in the Regional design express a style that is more diverse, alluding to the rich heritage of the Arabic culture. They offer an elegant glimpse of traditional architecture and woodwork. Regional Villas create an ambiance of a natural environment with a feel of sunny Dubai. 
Exclusive Pools and fountains grace every property and the work of Galvanized done on the patios and floors with geometrical designs enriches the beauty of the Jumeirah Park Regional Villas.
There are 3, 4 and 5 bedroom villas in Regional home styles to match high-end luxury. Open kitchens are typical, bedrooms are substantially-sized, bathrooms are quite spacious, and every villa benefits from smart home features along with premium electrical units and switches provided by default.
